ygData.subject: Amperion turns back
ygData.msgSnippet: ... He thinks of something and quickly returns to where Amp s body is lying. I hope this works.  It is time to put all of your training to the test master.

Subject: Amperion turns back
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Windows AOL sub 111
From: Rudra656@...

::Amperion::
    He thinks of something and quickly returns to where Amp's body is lying.  
"I hope this works.  It is time to put all of your training to the test 
master."  Amp is still in robot mode so Amperion simply pinned his arms down. 
 "Weapons of my enemy become my own!"  Upon saying this he writhed in pain 
but kept his arms locked onto Amp's.  Suddenly Amp's horns that became the 
bladed backs of his hands stuck out of Amperion's arms.  Satisfied he 
retracted his new weapons into his arms.
